content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the top of the parking structure in encinitas and saw immediately a blinking blue light that changed to red , then green then white..Then flashed fast then slow. then the white light seemed bigger then there was two lights. then flashing again. there was no rhythm to it. the lights did not move..Maybe a little up then down but stayed in the same place. it never went away
content.summary: Noticed red then blue then green then white light..Flashing then going out then flashing all different times. then there will be two lights then one bigger white light

content.detailedDescription:
In sept 2013, while using google earth to view the moon i visited the mare moscoviense area.  my eye-altitude varied from a few hundred metres to about 2 kms. i try to have objects of 100m easily-viewed. it was in the south eastern section that i saw many rectangular and other seemingly artificial objects and then moved on and found hundreds more.  from that time until now i have spent a few hours every day.  

examples: in an equatorial strip-section of the earth side of the moon i found a jpg showing what appears to be a very bright spot about 50m in diameter. it looks as if a very powerful coherant energy device (lazer in gigajoule range) was in the process of buring a, 'trench,' into the surface.  see, 'surface burn,' pic.

on that 2,400km strip i found 54 identicle blgs i call, 'castles,' a label of conveniencel.  these are equally spaced with the same geographical orientation.  the long-lat at the bottom right of these pics shows them to be seperate and not copies.

i have found a great deal more, some of it dramatic, all of it convincing.  i was a royal air force photographer/analyst trained to intepret ariel mosaics of former warsaw pact areas.  i have the experience and training to be utterly convinced of what i have found.

i took a cd with a few hundred jpgs i had downloaded from google earth to the local tv network (ntv) and they looked - and went silent, no answers to emails etc.  over that last few months i attempted 4 emails - none answered.

i can and will send pictures if you wish.  but it has been, 'suggested' that my attempts to the media is, 'unwise.'  

frankly, i do not think you will answer.  

suggestion:  can send you a copy of my google earth, 'my places,' where i have logged many items.  there's a few hundred and it would be easy for you to use this to see - what i have seen.

my pictures are utterely convincing and some are, to say the least, dramatic.

all the pictures google are sourced from, nasa, jaxa, selene and the usgs.  i have examined them in detail and while a few show data compression,  there is no evedence of manipulation by photo shop etc.

i have attached 5 pics below, but i have hundreds.
content.summary: Many ufo's and other structures on lunar surface

content.detailedDescription: Two giant crosses with thousands of lights. about the size of a football field without the end zones. so close i could have touched them. had a spike protruding from the bottom. the shape was as if you pushed four large tissue boxes into the shape of a cross. the width of each arm was about 50 ft. the thickness of each arm of the monstrosities was about 30 feet thick. all right angles. no sound. one at the top of the hill and one at the bottom. i had my head and shoulder out the window head craned back, looking at these things.  the spikes that were at the bottoms of the crafts were dark. the black, metal, square plates that seemed to be its construction, seemed to be welded overlapping. the squares were all different sizes. none were on point. they were all flat tops and bottom. the lights almost looked like inlaid leds. there was a fat band of blue, then nothing, fat band of white, then red lights in the center. there were a thousand lights if there was one. i got the impression this damned thing could flicker or flash in any combination it saw fit to. it was a dazzling light show. i was directly underneath these things, stopped, staring up at them, each in turn. the metal spikes had a mist about them, they were hard to see. even with all those lights in such close proximity i had to strain to see the black, metal spike.  i have tried to submit a report tonight. the other report had more details, but after spending a half hour typing only to see your little dino and the words connection lost. well, i am tired now. my 80 lb dog was freaked out bad barking, clawing, gnashing--at first. then near the end she was fetal, on the floor board. all the other cars were all stalled or stopped at the top or bottom of the hill. the oddest thing was that i almost got out of the car, but came to my senses. suddenly, i was scared. i think i was more awed at first, when the one at the bottom drifted over to my side of the road when i flashed my brights at it as i was coming down the hill. but i truly felt trapped when all the lights in the cabin were gone. no instrument lights, shifter or radio lights. anyway. sorry for the clipped version. but i had about 2000 more words of high detailed description before. i hope this helps. oh, one last thing. i drive that pass once a week. i still don't see how those damned monstrosities didn't get tangled in those high tension power lines.
content.summary: 2 giant cross ufos--one at top and one at bottom of hill.

content.detailedDescription:
9:20pm today 2/20/14 osprey fl- macewen drive

leaving dinner with mother, driving out driveway - orb as described flew straight toward us- out 50 feet; we both saw it; i was driving, tried to navigate around driveway & parking lot to follow take better look; orb flashed away in sweeping arc high to low then back to high; no sound; shape constant; perspective of size constant; no tail or dilution of any light projections; below tree level; disappeared behind trees; tracked for several minutes; both of us seeing multiple times; discussed what each other saw and heard; consistent with description above... left us both sort of awestruck, curious and confused...

discussed known ideas of what it could have been- nothing made sense- not helicopter or airplane light etc

returned home- filed report- asked mother to check time on watch for any clock disparity- none
content.summary: Glowing orb of light, blue exterior-red interior, darting, sweeping movements, very rapid speed, multiple direction changes, conisitent size like micro-ufo; time as reported exact within 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: While fishing with another guy on a bridge in strathmere nj a ball of fire came from the south on a nw flight course. i took video with my phone but it does not do it justice.  earlier that evening there was a missile launch from wallops island va and i also filmed that it took a different path and was over 2 hrs before we saw this object.
content.summary: Fireball in the sky for 5 min looked like a ball of fire on a straight path

content.detailedDescription: Driving back to my home along the pacific highway at approximately 4oclock in the morning. i firstly noticed a bright red light up ahead but obscured by trees.I believed i was going to pass an ambulance or fire truck as i rounded an s bend before i headed over the bridge and up the hill. as i straightend my car i observed a very large cone shaped object ahead hovering over the bridge. to my utter disbelief at what i was witnessing i couldn't make a rational decision as to what i should do.I didn't want to drive under it, i knew i couldn't stop as i was on a major highway and there was no where to pull over.In this brief moment of indecision the craft just seemed to disappear. i got the impression that it went west. i never saw the red light again that first alerted me that there was something up ahead. a local radio station had been contacted regarding this incident, there were 2 farms within view of the bridge. i didn't contact the station as i had no proof of what i had seen.Listening to the radio station over the coming day's they related over the radio the story they had envisioned what we saw.They claimed what we encountered was a truck coming down the hill sending off static electricity, this is totally incorrect as i never passed a truck or any other vehicle on the road. the next explanation was that it could of been a hologram. this is quite impossible as it was on a bend and nowhere a hologram could be set up. i  related my story to close friend who lives close to the sighting. she lives on a property and claimed to of seen the craft on several occasions. i told her i never saw the red light again and to my astonishment she told me that the red light i first noticed is the back of the craft. she said it was like an exhaust system. there is no doubt in my mind that what i saw on the night was a space craft.
content.summary: An unidentified craft hovering over a bridge on a major highway

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to get in my truck when i saw the first group of  four lights. i was looking south and the orange lights were moving east to west. i jumped in my truck and followed them and they seemed to speed up and disappear. as i was turning around to go home, i noticed a group of five more moving from the northeast to the southwest, they also soon went outta sight.
content.summary: Two groups of orange orbs flying in a line

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed unusual lights in the north of a clear, cold, night sky at 10.50pm thursday 20th february 2014 by husband first who called wife outside to witness the event as well. while husband checking the garage is locked for the night he saw a very bright, soundless light first showing red and white and at first he thought it was our local emergency helicopter, but when he noticed there was no sound on a clear night with no other aircraft in sight and it began to change to green and blue colours, he noticed it was unusual. he noticed its flight path was a slow but jerky descent toward the tree line in the north, and as it slowed it was joined by another exactly like it but the second light circled precisely around the first before both lights descended slowly over the lake illawarra area. we both felt curiosity at the event and hoped we could see more as these particular ufos are quite beautiful compared to others we have seen. couldn't get the camera out quick enough and sighting was unusual as we don't make machinery that looks and behaves like this. lost sight of objects behind tree line on the horizon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First one multicoloured light descending and joined by another one that partly circled it and then they both descended in the direction of lake illawarra. no noise, clear beautiful night, no wind, cold and two witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: Eating usual ice cream with m&ms with dad watchin' cops (when that was still on) with dad, sister was comin' home from speech meet. we hear a light rumble, like a big farm truck. sister calls on her nokia brick phone, tells dad there's a glowing truck outside. says there was a man sneaking next to the house, who she had scared off. said he ran to his truck, to which we ran to see (gun in hand, of course, we aren't stupid or foolin' around). in the brief 15 seconds, we saw the truck shift silently with the same rumble as before, then drive off to the north. truck was glowin' a transparent dark/ light leaf green, was like a military transport of the 1950s or 40s, and had a 45 degree angled "v" shape antennae on top of the cab. man was the man was the same appearance as the truck, see through/ green, ran across our ditch into the truck to "start it up". reported to davenport "sheriff" (not sure if davenport even had a sheriff then), he came in his truck haulin' snowmobiles (hotter than hell out!) said he and everyone he could in town to hunt down the truck. we all searched, didn't find anything in the surrounding towns, got neighboring towns/ counties searching all possible routes, closed in on where the truck definitely should have been: it was nowhere to be found. disappeared.
content.summary: Ghostly truck with antennae, transparent ghost man, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the night sky with my telescope when i noticed a bright white light low in the n.E sky over my local town. at first i thought it was the police helicopter using its spot light in my direction, just for fun i attempted to view it with my scope but could not due to it having a motorized 
mount. in this time the light had got much closer to me and i began to think how it must be causing a disturbance with its engine, been so low at night over houses. with this in mind i was waiting to hear the beating of the rotor blades, and even though it was now very close i did not think it was strange that i could not, having had experience of helicopters in the army i am aware of the sound been absent in certain situations due to environmental conditions. by this time the object was only a short distance away approx 100m and i was starting to wonder why i could neither hear the engine or make out any structure. at this point i became aware that it was just a ball of bright white light and i was totally amazed at what i was seeing, the orb floated over my head at maybe 40 feet in height without any sound and in a straight line. the light did not cast a beam in any direction and looked identical in every direction i viewed it, as it moved off away from me it passed over the house behind mine, and it was at this point i could make a fairly accurate estimation of its size approx 10 feet in diameter. and altitude 40 feet due to its close vicinity to the building. i watched has it disappeared over the house and stood perplexed of what i had just witnessed. although i have an interest in the ufo phenomenon i am also a very rational person who will always try to find rational answers to things. this why i have not reported the sighting until now. i have done my very best to find an answer to what i saw that has a rational explanation but have been unable to do so. the only explanation i can give myself is that i witnessed either an unknown atmospheric phenomenon or a ufo. one thing i do know is it wasn't an aircraft type, balloon, chinese lantern or any other regular object, and i will wonder about it until the day i die.   yours faithfully [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Glowing orb traveled overhead silently and slowly at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking in the sky n i c a big "orange" ball flying over the trees.Not white lights as an airplane has,no big n orange. if i c an airplane with my eyes i would say it depends how high it is ....I c the lights of a high one at the size of a nail head n a low one at the size of a dime. i hear the low ones perfectly. so this one is the size of an soccer ball, that must mean it's very very low. but there is no engine noise at all. only my pond water. my husband said ( he just missed it of about 5 minutes) maybe it was a blimp. i say no. 1. it's very windy.2. it was much to fast. 3. y would it b orange n round. i made a picture with phone n u can't really c it orange or round. i think it's because i made the picture through my trees n limbs r in the way. so i started filming...But it was already to far away... which tells me it wasn't a blimp either...To fast.
content.summary: A big orange ball was flying in airplane speed without any noise whatever over my backyard

content.detailedDescription: I had just laid down to go to sleep but was still wide awake, laying on my back in bed petting my cat and waiting to doze off to sleep. suddenly there was a brilliant flash of a bright white light that made me suddenly open up my eyes only to witness a golfball-sized yellow/orange colored orb hovering/moving only about 16 inches from my face and it was floating very slowly towards the wall next to my bed, where the orb entered the wall and disappeared without any trace whatsoever. the wall that the orb went into has a history with me of the sound of someone pounding on the wall right next to my head when i am sleeping, waking me up just moments before the 3 knocks or bangs occur. this has happened at least 7 times in the last year. there is nobody using the room next to mine and it always happens at between 2-3 am consistently. i always get out of bed and run to the next room just to see if i can catch someone playing a joke on me, but the only other people in this house are my elderly parents who are both deaf and unable to get around with any speed at all - so i know it isn't them or anyone else. the room next door is always closed and dark with no place to hide. i have seen several different orbs here in this bedroom, but usually it's during the daylight hours and the orbs are always a bright cobalt blue in color and they just pop into the air about 6 feet off the floor and hover for a brief moment and then disappear just as quickly - always leaving me to wonder if my eyes are just tired and playing tricks on me, however it's happened too many times now to just brush the experiences off as merely being tired. i've had many sightings of actual ufo's in the skies over phoenix arizona, again most of the sightings occurred during the daylight hours and almost always with at least one witness on hand as well. i know that i am being monitored by something that doesn't come from this planet due to certain 'feelings' or intuition that i can feel strongly when i am being 'watched' by either an implant or some type of mental telepathy method. one night about 5 years ago i was in my backyard star gazing at around 9pm at night when i saw a bright 'star' in the western sky that i just 'felt' was not really a star but a ufo disguising itself as a star(they love to do that !). i mentally projected to the ufo that i can see that it isn't really a star but i did thank it for being observable by me. i also asked the 'star' to flash a light at me if i am correct in my assumption regarding it's true nature and the ufo/star flashed an amazingly bright white light right down on me for about 3 seconds and then it dimmed way down so that it blended in more uniformly with the other stars in the sky that night. it was so exciting to have that happen to me and i always thank the ufo's that i see (mentally of course and with deliberate intent for 'them' to 'hear' my thanking them). nothing would please me more than to someday soon make personal face-to-face contact with a benevolent ebe/entity and ask for their help in bringing a non-polluting energy source   to this planet so we can start to help bring this living planet back to a healthy level again. i find all of this wonderfully exciting and as someone who has seen so much evidence of their crafts in our skies, i have no doubt that we are surrounded by many many et's, most of them in cloaked form (usually surrounding themselves in a cloud-like vapor to blend  in with the other clouds). keep your eyes open and pointed to the skies and hopefully more of us will see this evidence and mankind will somehow make it known to the et's that we are ready now to meet them and become an active part of the interstellar community that obviously exists all around us, and in many dimensions. peace to all of mankind...Put down your guns and open your arms and eyes to the hidden reality that is within reach - right now !
content.summary: Bright flash nade me open my eyes and a small orb floated past my face and into a wall

content.detailedDescription: At midnight heading back towards the house from the mailbox i looked over the mountains to the west. i noticed a double-light object headed north by northwest--in the direction of downtown. i knew immediately this wasn't an average craft. i could not hear it and i could see no typical blinking beacon lights, nor was there a contrail. these lights were all white--brighter than a plane or satellite. as far as i could tell, just two lights, one following another--one object. as the object moved n by nw the light seemed to lose their intensity and almost seemed like the two lights developed red haze/halo around them. i saw this same effect occur when the iss drifted towards the horizon. i would have to say this object moved 3-4 times faster than a helicopter. 5 times as fast as a commercial jet, faster than a fighter jet. my immediate reaction was that i needed to document this sighting. this wasn't usual as compared to the typical air traffic in the area at this time of night.
content.summary: Duel lights. bright.  high speed. headed n by nw. no beacons. as it faded into horizon, turned red around lights.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were going west on elizabeth street towards groesbeck highway clinton township michigan when i look up in the sky i saw this orange lighted object at first thought it was one of those chinese lanterns. it was above the macomb county sheriff's office and jail it was going north northeast. i was driving so i couldn't really get a good look she opened the window and look up to the sky and said there was a similar object kind of like a triangular boomerang shaped in front of it with no lights the same shape as the lighted  object. i am glad my girlfriend was with me because she does not believe in anything like ufos if i will just see that myself she say it was a plane, helicopter or something like that.
content.summary: Orange lighted object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work about 9:30 pm and was on the west bound 22 freeway east of brookhurst street in garden grove when i sighted right in front of me a bright gold bell shaped object below the cloud cover with a gold trail following it. i could not tell it's speed.It was like it was following the freeway the direction it was traveling. i only had it in sight for maybe 15 to 20 seconds before it was over then behind me. i tried to get off the freeway to follow the object but by the time i reached the off ramp and turned around i couldn't see it anymore.
i knew it wasn't any man-made object that i have ever seen before.
my feelings during and after the sighting i do not believe were affected. 
i wish i could contact the person who reported (#54151) seeing several gold objects just west of the location of my sighting and several days later and about the same time of day,to compare notes on what they saw.
content.summary: Gold, bell shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i 275 into tampa from st. pete at appx 5pm and saw in a clear blue sky a dark smoky looking arrow shape behind it was a smoky blur behind that was a dark perfect smoke circle. looked as if an arrow had been shot thru a circle leaving a smoke smudge after it passed thru the circle. while bringing it to the attn. of passenger noted another line appearing more as a drawn circle line forming behind the former perfect circle which had begun to lose symmetry in shape. circles continued to form as previous circles began to lose shape. each circle formed one behind the next in a row. circles formed slower than any aircraft could fly as traffic was at a rush hour crawl for appx 30 minutes while observing. one circle was a double formation, like one ring slightly elevated above the other. there was no other smoke or clouds in the sky. it did not seem to have a ground source. there were at last count a total of 8 circles formed until passed beyond the circles parallel south of vehicle and lost sight of circles while driving east. did note 2 small nodule like forms opposite each other in circle diameter. one was dark and tiny bump and the other sometime had a red-orange color and was slightly larger of the two. objects were too tiny to be any kind of plane. too high to be model planes. could they have been drones from military base in tampa? i do not know. i did find a few photos very similar online identified as mystery circles on news and paranormal sites. i don't know what it was but never seen anything like it before in my 50+ years. very odd.
content.summary: Driving e on i275 toward tampa. saw smoky arrow form,behind it a smoky blur,behind that a smoke ring.  saw another smoke ring forming like a drawn ring as each was formed and began to change another formed. total count8 at last view with one double ring.

content.detailedDescription:
during the early morning hours of dec 9th, 2012, i was in the company of my cousin at his apartment in suburban indianapolis, in, usa, hanging out after a party i had attended earlier in the evening where i had engaged with a man on a higher consciousness level. this chance meeting raised a lot of eyebrows while opening the door to the contact event.
     while using my cellphone to carry a deep text message conversation with a friend, my cousin was nose-to-screen deep in sorting through debugging error logs attempting to troubleshoot an issue with his pc. we had spent a couple of hours staring into our respective screens with little verbal conversation between us. for some reason, i noticed his taskbar icons when i checked the time, specifically the volume being muted through the volume mixer. there were no browser pages open in the background, just a few control panel modules he had opened to get to the program he was using currently. 
     as the sun came up, something just changed in the room, the energy was creating a "hum" in my ears which i also happened to notice affecting the intensity of my cousin's tapping at the keyboard. suddenly, a crashing sound came blasting through the small desktop speakers on the desk, no warning, out of nowhere. startled by the abrupt volume and the sheer weirdness of it all, we both just stared at each other like "what in the...?" until i was jolted to record the whole thing with the digital mic on my cellphone. somehow, i just "knew" i was supposed to capture the message because it was being transmitted somehow through my energy. 
     the recording lasted four and a half minutes, the actual message possibly being about ten seconds or more in length from reception of the signal to the moment i hit the record button. at first, it sounded like a rogue frequency bleeding through a radio or cellphone, but a keener ear revealed startling "binaries" i later deciphered. the untrained ear only hears commercials, specifically being unable to relate the syntax to the context of events leading to the manifestation of the signal. 
     for three weeks, my life was turned upside down as the celestial succession of the vernal equinoxes signified the final tick of the long count, 12/12/12, when i decided to play the recording for a friend. the immediate reaction he projected was fear, so intense his eyes teared yet he said he wasn't actually "crying". since then, the effect of this recording on others has been bizarre to say the least. my awareness leads me to understand it is parallel to the fictitious vega transmission from sagan's novel contact. buried deep in within the waveform is a hexadecimal/golden rule sequence of data masked by the seemingly redundant infomercials and broadcast chatter. the mere fact the majority of various transmissions correlated to recent or future life events in my personal life was proof enough to family and friends something eerie was happening. i felt like richard dreyfus' character from close encounters of the third kind. my life has not been the same since, nor have the manifestations ceased. i have had countless instances of unexplainable phenomena amongst numerable startled or even scared witnesses all across the country. 
     to date, there has been one similar signal transmission phenomena to occur, either an aftershock or another reminder of things to come. over the course of the past 3 years, my track record with contact seems to be more empirical and less anecdotal as each day passes. in this day and age, i find it hard to believe there is a more compelling example of an individual truly maintaining that open channel, releasing the resulting energies i have come to harness as a result. my personal life has been turned upside down, isolating me from family and close friends due to the intensity of the true nature of such an event challenging the paradigms and belief systems of anybody in contact with me since and during the fallout.
content.summary: Early in the morning, a message was transferred through me from outside the building via a computer desktop speaker. the resulting recording established 5th kind contact manifestations continuing to this day.

content.detailedDescription: After shopping at ralphs in anaheim hills i was startled by two very loud military helicopters flying low at great speed.Once my eyes got focused on them i then noticed a star size ball of light. this light was small but super bright. brighter than venus or the brightest star in the sky. it was in front of the choppers also moving quickly. the choppers shined lights onto it as they were trying to keep up. the orb then dissapeared for 2 to 3 seconds. it then reappeared having gained significant distance further separating itself from the helicopters that were obviously worried about this thing and were at max speed chasing it. at least a dozen other people witnessed the same event. i do not know what this thing was but i know what it wasnt. it wasnt a star, plane, chopper, the moon, a laser light, a planet, any natural light or natural phenomenon.  this was a bone chilling experience that i will never forget. feel free to contact me with any questions.Thank you
content.summary: I was in a parking lot when i heard two very loud miltary choppers chasing a ball of light accross the sky. the light dissapeared once for 3 seconds and then appeared again gaining significant distance from the choppers. at least a

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving our car and i was sitting in the passenger seat near dale and orangewood at about 7:45pm. we  heard and then saw a very low flying helicopter to the northeast of us. it looked as if it was chasing another helicopter at first but the other craft did not have the flashing red and white lights. the helicopter shined it's searchlight on the craft and it hovered for a moment. it appeared to be a metallic sphere. my husband and i were in awe by what we saw. with the searchlight still on the craft, we could see that it changed shape into a disc and sped off in an eastward direction, with the helicopter chasing after it. we tried to speed up to see where both the helicopter and the craft went, but they both sped off too fast.
content.summary: I saw a helicopter chasing a grey sphere.

content.detailedDescription: Did not see this ufo when i took this photo was not till later i discovered it.Was a quiet day in a field on our target range no planes or birds temp was hot about 86 degrees.The object in the picture appears to be at about the 50-75 yrd marker out on the gun lane and about 100 feet up?
content.summary: Did not see this ufo when i took this picture.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work collecting samples and when i looked west there they were in a straight line the circular smaller one was in front of the other four, then the small one made a gradual turn to the west and disappeared, then the other bigger ones followed the same pattern, same happened new years eve in my home town of venice fl, there were more than the ones i saw but they looked the same shape, formation, light color. could not take pictures i wanted to but it was night time and the objects kept moving south, south west.
content.summary: One small sphere in front and four following bigger ones then small one turned west first and then the others followed, saw same in venice florida during new years eve around 6:30 pm same shape and light color.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on patio at 8:20 pm mild night with thin cloud cover.  looking to the sky to the north east saw incredibly bright object cross sky from northeast to southeast so fast it vanished in an instant, in complete silence.  due to cloud cover the edges appeared blurry, but it was oval shaped. it was much bigger than a shooting star and did not flicker the way they do or have a trail.  it appeared to be the size of a penny or a dime, estimated about a mile away. i was amazed. stood out there for five minutes listening and watching.  there was no sound either with the object or afterwards.  i realized i had seen a ufo. i saw one flash across the sky from west to east in ohio in 1972, and one hovering in the canyonlands of utah where i was camping in the desert in 1975. this is the first one i have seen in illinois.
content.summary: Very bright soundless object moving faster than any aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv in the backroom and through the large picture window notice what at first i thought was a plane coming in for a landing. then i noticed another, and another. they kept coming in close formation. i lost count, but it was over 20. i also noticed late in the formation what appeared to be a helicopter that seemed to fly along side formation, but not sure, because it was closer and flew to the nw not ne as the lights

no sound was heard and lights kind of pulsed ( changing in brightness, but always bright).
 formation was a staggered line heading from south, se to north, ne.

i lost sight as the lights past my horizon to the ne.
content.summary: Group of 20 + lights moving slowly north,

content.detailedDescription: I let the dogs out of our back door just alittle prior to sunset.  as is my custom, i scan the area and the sky.  i was admiring how the setting sun was reflecting off jet trails in the sky, making them appear orange/yellow/pink, etc.  there was one jet trail headed west in the front, and one jet trail headed west further in the rear..........Both "trails" illuminated clearly by the rapidly setting sun.  then i noticed a very bright, solid white light appear between the 2 jet trails.........But it had no "trail" at all.  in addition, it became brighter and dimmer, but also appeared to be headed in the general direction of the 2 jets which did have illuminated "trails".  i observed this strange, exceedingly bright white "light" grow brighter and dimmer for about 2 minutes or so, and then it was gone.  what was very interesting about it was that immediately following it's sudden disappearance, a commercial airliner began it's approach to the local airport (about 8 miles from here), and 3 additional jets came very fast from the east, appearing to follow the exact same course...And with their "trails" illuminated, as well. whatever that exceedingly bright light was, it was clearly not a jet, a plane, a star, or a planet. i observed the last 3 jets going very quickly to the west, and did not see anything else. i watched until dark, and did not observe any other unusual things.
content.summary: 2 jet trails with object in between them as sun was low on horizon

content.detailedDescription: So im in house and i forgot left dog outside without chain went out get him he came back to me then im talking to my brother about cops he says i see light but tjem disapeared get ready go back inside i see pairs of undefined flying object i went get my dad because he seen object in air few days ago withnsparkling light coming off then disapered then saw jets in air after so we he thinking they were jets and im military expert at airbase we only have a-10 warthog and helicopter at selfidge that public knows about so its nome of those because it makes no noise but i dont know how many pairs we seen but each had two and they disapeared when got over head or to close and we tried record but eithet not enough light or two small but they seem real close because a commercial plane flew over the aircraft far way above them and all we seen on object were lights no sihloutee were i can see helicopters that distance its weird but im thinking its alien into all explanations drawn out and it was just weird and they were not chinese baloons because ive seen those before please contact me when you know what they are
content.summary: 2 orange light of about 3 pair dissapear when seem get closer then end other side of house

content.detailedDescription: I don't smoke in the house so if i want a cigarette i go outside into the back garden.My garden is approx 30 meters long and has a raised railway embankment at the bottom of it.It was a clear night and as i looked up over the embankment i saw something that i can only describe as out of this world.Hovering in the night sky were two ufo's. triangular in shape one just in front of the other, the rear one just to the left of the one in front.Thy were very illuminated with ice white light on the upper and lower sides of the craft and a vivid blue band of lights that separated the upper from the lower part's of the craft. on the underside of the two crafts i observed three circular power motors. they were glowing in a redish orange glow.I estimated the distance from myself and the craft to be around three hundred meters at the most.And around five hundred meters off the ground.I have never seen anything as beautiful in my life.Truly breath taking.Just above the blue band of lights i could see a line of windows but could not see inside them.As i watched them in the night sky they started to move in formation just to the right over my head. there was no noise what so ever.They moved slowly towards the west still at the same height.As they passed over head they looked more pyramid shaped as though they had sat up instead of lying flat.I then lost sight of them as they moved behind the house.If these craft were of our world then i would be proud of what we had engineered.But in all honesty,they were truly awe inspiring craft to behold. i feel very privileged to have seen them.Every evening now i keep an eye out for others.
content.summary: Two triangula craft with white/blue lights.And three circular motors, one in each corner. out of this world stuff. beautifull to see

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dog out for his nightly potty break (about 9:15 pm) when i noticed a very low flying "plane" with intense lights heading directly towards me form the south. as i watched it get closer, it became obvious that there were no wings. it was not silent but instead emitted a low-toned, very steady hum. there were no windows present, no landing gear or wheel wells that i could make out. the best i could describe it would be to say it was a military-like jet without wings, landing gear, sound, etc. the rear resembled dual, very intense afterburners, although there was no fluctuation in light, such as bleed-off. also missing, from an afterburner sense, was the obvious lack of noise and the lack of fire/heat release. i also have trouble calling them simply lights, as they seemed more like a power source. the underbelly was a dull grey and was brightened somewhat (maybe from glow from the front lights). the craft continued north for around another 10 seconds or so before turning northwest, with no obvious tilt, as one would expect from an airplane. the craft was slender in form and looked to be approximately 50 feet long.  what struck me as odd is that i didn't think about what i saw until the day after and that i went to bed as if nothing out of the norm had occurred. in fact, i remember dismissing it so fast that i didn't wait to see it disappear out of sight. it shifted northwest and i simply went inside.
content.summary: Object flew directly overhead, no wings, blue and white lights up front, shine on underbelly, afterburner-like effect to the rear without the sound or varied intensity or uneven light effect.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was standing at the edge of the driveway, facing the house across the street. i wasn't doing anything in particular, just enjoying being outside. i remember that it was sometime around my high school graduation, but not on my exact graduation date...Maybe shortly after. summers are hot here, so it's only comfortable to be outdoors before sunrise or after sundown. the time of day was...Getting dark. when the even started it was pink-ish/orange-y sky time, and when it ended it was definitely dark out.
2. what made me notice the object was that they appeared in the sky right in front of my eyes. it was cloudy - i could only see solid cloud cover in the sky, but not dark rain clouds. as i stood there watching, six circular lights appeared above the house i was facing. high above, not low or in close proximity to the roof. i saw the outline of the circle-lights against the clouds in the sky. but there was no shadow of any object (such as an aircraft), and no beams of light going into or emanating from the light-circles in any direction. there are several car dealerships nearby, many of which liked to aim search lights into the sky (from the ground) at night, to attract attention for business (i guess). it was a popular thing for the dealerships to do at the time. those searchlights always had a prominent beam visible from the ground, and the circles of light they gave off always warped into ovals at sky level. they also used to rotate them around so the search light beams swept the skies. the circle-lights i saw that night had none of those properties. they were perfect, unwarped circles against the clouds with no visible beams (or source) that i could determine.
3. i didn't have any particular ideas of what the lights were, other than just lights. i knew they weren't search lights like the dealerships used. 
4. there were six of the circle-lights in the sky and they appeared in a circular formation. if i held my hand up to the sky, i'd say the size of each circle-light was maybe tennis ball sized (for what that's worth). the lights began to rotate around in a circle, sometimes stopping, sometimes switching and rotating in the opposite direction, sometimes clustering together into a tight circle (sometimes converging into one circle) and rotating/spinning rapidly and sometimes spreading back out into a wider circle, rotating/spinning slightly slower.  i think i watched this for about twenty minutes before the lights suddenly disappeared.
5. my feelings were of amazement, amusement, a bit of fear, but mostly i felt as if i were watching them (the circle-lights) play or dance
content.summary: Hovering, circular lights, spinning/rotating

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were leaving our house to go to our grandson's birthday party.  i looked at the clock in the pickup as i got into the passenger side as i didn't want us to be late.  it read 7:12 pm (1912). as my husband was backing out of the driveway, i looked out of my opened window and noticed in the southwest sky, a formation of five very bright, larger than stars, objects in the sky.  three of the objects formed a triangle with two more at a distance, one to the right and above, and one to the right of that one and below it.  the clock read 7:13 pm (1913).  my son's house is about eight minutes from my house.  during the drive i observed these objects until they disappeared completely at 7:19 pm (1919).  during the drive the first five objects were joined by two more.  the objects changed configuration five times during the drive from the original sighting at 7:13 pm.  however, the triangle stayed the same the whole time.  each change was just an appearance of another object, usually at the right point of the triangle, kind of like a tail of a kite. there was no movement when this happened, they just appeared. so there ended up being the triangle of lights, two additional lights at the right end of the triangle and the same two lights as described above (at 7:13), further to the right, one above and the other one to the right and one below.  there was never any sound or movement during these changes.  i observed a total of seven objects.  at 7:17(1917), the lights started just blinking out at the right (tail) end of the triangle, one by one, until they all disappeared by 7:19pm (1919). it was a clear night with no clouds. you could see the stars clearly.  that is why these objects or lights were much larger and brighter than the stars were.  i did make a sketch of the configurations and the times that each change happened.  in 1997 my husband and i lived in northern arizona.  on several occasions i observed the same type of lights although in different configurations.
content.summary: I saw a formation of lights that were stationary and that  changed in numbers and configuration.
